verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* angels \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God met \w him|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* said \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w them|strong="H1870"\w*, \w This|strong="H1870"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* God’s host: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* called \w the|strong="H1870"\w* name \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H4397"\w* place Mahanaim.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* sent messengers \w before|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* Esau \w his|strong="H7121"\w* brother \w unto|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Seir, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* field \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Edom.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* commanded \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, saying, Thus \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* say \w unto|strong="H4397"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* lord \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*; Thus saith \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* servant \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* have sojourned \w with|strong="H6440"\w* Laban, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* stayed \w until|strong="H7704"\w* \w now|strong="H7971"\w*:

\w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* asses \add and \add*flocks, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* ard maidservants: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* tell \w my|strong="H3290"\w* lord, \w that|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H3541"\w* find grace \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w thy|strong="H6215"\w* sight.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H5650"\w* returned \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w*, saying, \w We|strong="H4672"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w thy|strong="H5046"\w* brother Esau, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w cometh|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w meet|strong="H4672"\w* \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* four hundred \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H3290"\w* greatly afraid \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w was|strong="H3290"\w* distressed: \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* divided \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w* \w that|strong="H4397"\w* \w was|strong="H3290"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* flocks, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* herds, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* camels, \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w two|strong="H1980"\w* companies;

\w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* said, If Esau \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w company|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* smite \w it|strong="H4264"\w*, \w then|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w company|strong="H4264"\w* \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* left \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* escape.

\w And|strong="H4264"\w* Jacob said, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father Abraham, \w and|strong="H4264"\w* God \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father Isaac, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H6215"\w* saidst \w unto|strong="H7604"\w* \w me|strong="H5221"\w*, Return \w unto|strong="H7604"\w* \w thy|strong="H6215"\w* country, \w and|strong="H4264"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w thy|strong="H6215"\w* kindred, \w and|strong="H4264"\w* \w I|strong="H6215"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* do \w thee|strong="H7604"\w* good:

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* least \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mercies, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* truth, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast \w shewed|strong="H3190"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* servant; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* staff \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w passed|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w* Jordan; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H3327"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H7725"\w* two companies.

Deliver \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* pray \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brother, \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Esau: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, lest \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* smite \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mother \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* saidst, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H3027"\w* good, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* seed \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sea, \w which|strong="H6215"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* numbered \w for|strong="H3588"\w* multitude.

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* lodged \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* night; \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w took|strong="H7760"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w which|strong="H2344"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* present \w for|strong="H3808"\w* Esau \w his|strong="H7760"\w* brother;
\w two|strong="H3947"\w* hundred she-goats \w and|strong="H3027"\w* twenty he-goats, \w two|strong="H3947"\w* hundred ewes \w and|strong="H3027"\w* twenty rams,
thirty milch camels \w and|strong="H3967"\w* their colts, forty kine \w and|strong="H3967"\w* ten bulls, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* she-asses \w and|strong="H3967"\w* ten foals.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6242"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H1121"\w* into \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants, \w every|strong="H1121"\w* drove \w by|strong="H1121"\w* itself; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants, Pass over before \w me|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* put \w a|strong="H3068"\w* space betwixt drove \w and|strong="H1121"\w* drove.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* commanded \w the|strong="H6440"\w* foremost, saying, \w When|strong="H5674"\w* Esau \w my|strong="H5414"\w* brother meeteth \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* asketh \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, saying, \w Whose|strong="H5650"\w* art \w thou|strong="H3027"\w*? \w and|strong="H3027"\w* whither goest \w thou|strong="H3027"\w*? \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w whose|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt say, \add They be \add*\w thy|strong="H6440"\w* servant Jacob’s; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* present \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* lord \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: \w and|strong="H3212"\w*, behold, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* behind \w us|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1571"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* second, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* third, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* followed \w the|strong="H7971"\w* droves, saying, \w On|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* manner \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* ye speak \w unto|strong="H7971"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w when|strong="H7971"\w* ye find \w him|strong="H7971"\w*;

\w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w ye|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, behold, \w thy|strong="H6215"\w* servant Jacob \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w behind|strong="H1980"\w* \w us|strong="H4672"\w*. \w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* appease \w him|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* afterward \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* see \w his|strong="H3605"\w* face; peradventure \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* accept \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w passed|strong="H5650"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* lodged \w that|strong="H3588"\w* night \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* company.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* rose \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w took|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* two wives, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* two handmaids, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* eleven children, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ford|strong="H5674"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jabbok.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sent|strong="H5674"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* stream, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sent|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H8198"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* Jacob was \w left|strong="H5674"\w* alone; \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w there|strong="H5158"\w* wrestled \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* until \w the|strong="H3947"\w* breaking \w of|strong="H5158"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* day.

\w And|strong="H5927"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* prevailed \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* touched \w the|strong="H5704"\w* hollow \w of|strong="H3498"\w* \w his|strong="H3290"\w* thigh; \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* hollow \w of|strong="H3498"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s thigh \w was|strong="H3290"\w* strained, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* wrestled \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w go|strong="H3201"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* day breaketh. \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w* \w go|strong="H3201"\w*, \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* bless \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w unto|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w What|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H1288"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* name? \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3290"\w* \w he|strong="H3290"\w* said, \w Thy|strong="H3290"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H3290"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H8034"\w* no more \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w but|strong="H4100"\w* Israel: \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* hast striven \w with|strong="H8034"\w* God \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w with|strong="H8034"\w* \w men|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3290"\w* hast prevailed.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* asked \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, Tell \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* pray thee, \w thy|strong="H3478"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, Wherefore \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* dost ask \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3290"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*? \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* blessed \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w there|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w called|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w* Peniel: \w for|strong="H8034"\w*, \add said he\add*, \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* seen God face \w to|strong="H8033"\w* face, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* life \w is|strong="H2088"\w* preserved.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sun \w rose|strong="H3290"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* passed \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* halted \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* thigh.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Israel eat \w not|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sinew \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hip|strong="H3409"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hollow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*, \w unto|strong="H5674"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* day: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* touched \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hollow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob’s \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sinew \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hip|strong="H3409"\w*.
